segments.text: Good afternoon , sir . Please sit here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A haircut and a shave , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How would you like your hair cut , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Short on both sides . Not so much off at the back .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very well , sir . Do you want me to trim your beard ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now have a look , please . Is it all right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . I would like my hair cut shorter on the temples .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , thanks . But I'd like a facial massage .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now where should I pay the money ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You should go to the counter , just over there .
segments.speaker: S1
